roll up the burrito
boil and strain the potatoes put them into a pan and mash
add some milk and mash the potatoes
boil some water in a pan and add cabbage green onions salt and pepper
transfer the mashed potatoes into a mixing bowl and mix with cabbage
sprinkle some salt and pepper and continue mixing
scoop the mixture on a plate and garnish with chopped parsley
slice 2 kilos of tomatoes in half and place it flesh side up on a baking tray
cut two spanish onions into quarter pieces and scatter them on the tomatoes
squash about 7-8 cloves of garlic and distribute it around the onions and tomatoes
season with some sea salt cracked pepper and dried oregano add some extra virgin olive oil around the pan
cook it in the oven
pop all the garlic flesh out and discard the skin
pour all the ingredients into a soup pot pour the stock into the pot and put it on medium heat
add some chopped basil leaves into it
tear half ciabatta bread pieces into the pot and stir
slice and toast the bread in the pan
season the sauce with a splash of red wine vinegar
blend the soup and add olive oil
heat some butter in a pan and add some cumin seeds chopped garlic and chopped onions
add some chopped celery chopped bell pepper to the mixture in the pan
add chopped tomatoes some salt basil leaves and pepper and stir the mixture
blend the mixture using a blender
add flour to the butter in a pan
cook the mixture in the pan until it turns light brown in color
add strained tomato puree to the blond roux and stir the mixture continuously
add some sugar and cream
add flour eggs baking soda salt and pepper to the bowl and stir
add cold water to the bowl and stir
cover the shrimp in the batter and breadcrumbs
place the shrimp into a pan of hot oil
remove the shrimp from the pan
